snippet: Although it's unclear whether President Obama's polls have already begun to decline, it's more likely than not that they will tighten some between now and the election.
abstract: Although it's unclear whether President Obama's polls have already begun to decline, it's more likely than not that they will tighten some between now and the election.

headline.main: Oct. 1: Is the Presidential Race Tightening Heading Into the Debates?
